channel.title: Oracle Access Management on Oracle Fusion Middleware on Kubernetes
channel.description: Recent content in Oracle Access Management on Oracle Fusion Middleware on Kubernetes

item.title: Release Notes
item.description: Review the latest changes and known issues for Oracle Access Management on Kubernetes. Recent changes Date Version Change April, 2022 22.2.1 Updated for CRI-O support. November, 2021 21.4.2 Supports Oracle Access Management domain deployment using WebLogic Kubernetes Operator 3.3.0. Voyager ingress removed as no longer supported. October 2021 21.4.1 A) References to supported Kubernetes, Helm and Docker versions removed and replaced with Support note reference.
